sentences.sContent: Yet the physical changes that go with affluence destroy the habitats of migratory shorebirds and seabirds, wreaking havoc on their numbers along the crucial East Asian-Australasian flyway.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yet the physical changes that go with affluence destroy the habitats of migratory shorebirds and seabirds, wreaking havoc on their numbers along the crucial East Asian-Australasian flyway.
sentences.sCn: 然而开发所带来的自然地理变化破坏了迁徙滨鸟和海鸟的栖息地，也就给重要的东亚-大洋洲候鸟迁徙路线沿途上的这些鸟类带来了灾难性的破坏，导致它们数量的剧减。
